AStarPathFinding

Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • AStarPathFinding.Graph

  • public class Graph
extends Object
    This is the class for building up the graph, look for the path between two strings and print the path. It's main method is the entry of the program.
    Author:
    Haijin He

    • Constructor Detail

      • Graph

        public Graph(String path)
        Constructor of Graph class. First read the dictionary into a file. For each word in the dictionary, generate all its neighbors, scan the dictionary if any word matches the neighbors, and add edge.
        Parameters:
        path - an string for the path of the dictionary file.

      • findPath

        public void findPath(String s,
                     String d)
        Finds the path between source node and destination node. First check if string s and d really have a node. If not, print an error message and return. The precedure uses A* algorithm. A priority queue is used, based on the addition of cost_so_far and cost_estimate. cost_so_far is current distance from source cost_estimate is the estimate of remaining distance from destination. Here it is simply the length difference. Each step, takes a node from the priority queue, and recalculate all of it's neighbors.
        Parameters:
        s - the source node with string s
        d - the destination node with string d

      • initGraph

        public void initGraph(String s,
                      String d)
        initialize the graph for source node and destination node.
        Parameters:
        s - source node with string s
        d - destination node with string d

      • printPath

        public void printPath(String s,
                      String d)
        Prints the path from source node to destination node. Starts from destination node, push every previous node into a stack, till it reach source node. Then pops all nodes out from the stack.
        Parameters:
        s - source node with string s
        d - destination node with string d

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        Entry point for the program.
